ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Anybody alive
ygData.msgSnippet: what .. you mean you have friends out of eq??? /giggle 5 of my RL friends corrupted my husband, who in turn corrupted me and we in turn corrupted 2 more
ygData.messageBody:
what .. you mean you have friends out of eq???

/giggle

5 of my RL friends corrupted my husband, who in turn
corrupted me and we in turn corrupted 2 more couples.
Now with duplicate accounts and all, between myself
and RL friends there are 12 accounts.

And yes, i do still have a life outside of eq. I only
play when the kids are asleep or at school. That
would explain why over a year after creation Harmonie
is lvl 32. (This time last year i was 8th lvl.. so i
am making progress).

Harmonie Moonsong 32 bard
Talea 17 Necro
Ssubraena 17 Wizard (on other account so someday...
she can teleport me!!!)
Lillibit 13 Wizard
Kameka 13 Paladin (my original char hit 13 in June 99
and holding)
Cassilda 12 Cleric (on other account so someday I dont
have to look for rez!!!)
Galathir 3 Druid

--- "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@...>
wrote:
> *sniff*
> Everyone is leaving.. kinda sad but makes me happy
> to think we're all
> reacquainting ourselves with not only the sun and
> fresh air but our friends
> and families as well :)
>


=====
Harmonie Moonsong
<Lost Souls of Norrath>
